Wine Browser

Click the Toolbar button , the menu „Tools > Open Browser“ or the hotkey „Option (⌥)-Command (⌘)-B“

The wine browser has 4 parts

  • Wine Lists
  • Wine Filter
  • Wine List
  • Info Panel

Wine Lists

All your lists appear in the sidebar. The list part has the sections

  • General
  • Maturity
  • Tags
  • Lists

Wine Filter

Wine List

Info Panel
